maqras.text: Moshi, nise shinja ya kokoro ni yamai no yadoru mono, soshite shichu no sendo-sha-tachi ga,(sono akuji o) tomenakereba, kare-ra ni taishi anata o, karitatete yarou. So sureba kono ato, kare-ra ga anata gata no rinjin to shite i rareru no mo, wazuka no madearou
Kare-ra wa kanarazu norowa re, mitsukari shidai torae rare, korosarerudearou
Kore wa mukashi no sugisatta-sha-tachi ni taisuru, arra no kankodearu. Arra no kanko ni wa nani no henko mo nai
Hitobito wa (shinpan no)-ji ni tsuite anata ni tazuneyou. Itte yaru ga i. `Hontoni, sono chishiki wa, arra no omoto ni aru. Doshite anata ni wakarudarou ka, sonotoki wa chikaidearou
Hontoni arra wa fushin-sha ni gekido sa re, kare-ra no tame ni rekka o junbi nasa re
kare-ra wa eien ni sono naka ni sumi, gadian mo kyujo-sha mo miidasenaidearou
Sonohi, kare-ra no kao ga hi no naka de hikkurikaeri, kare-ra wa,`a , watashi-tachi wa arra ni shitagai, mata shito ni shitagaeba yokatta.' To iudarou
Mata kare-ra wa iudarou. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi wa, hontoni atama ya kenryoku-sha-tachi ni shitagatte imashita. Kare-ra ga watashi-tachi o,-do ni mayowa seta nodesu
Omo yo, kare-ra no chobatsu o 2-bai ni shite, hidoi gekido de kare-ra ni o okori kudasai
Shinko suru mono yo, musa o nayama shita mono no yodeatte wa naranai. Daga arra wa kare-ra no itta chusho kara, kare o kiyome rareta. Arra no omoto de, kare wa eiyo o atae rarete ita
Shinko suru mono yo, arra o osore nasai. (Tsuneni) jitchokuna kotoba de mono o ii nasai
Kare wa anata gata no tame ni sono okonai o kyosei sa re, moromoro no tsumi o yurusa reru. Arra to sono shito ni shitagau mono wa, tashika ni idaina kofuku o joju suru monodearu

Hontoni ware wa, sho ten to daichi to yamayama ni shintaku o moshitsuketa. Daga sorera wa sore o, ninau koto o jitai shi, katsu sore ni tsuite osoreta. Ningen wa sore o ninatta. Hontoni (ningen wa) fugideari katsu muchidearu

(Sore de) arra wa, nise shinja no otoko-tachi to on'na-tachi, mata tashinkyo to no otoko-tachi to on'na-tachi o, shobatsu nasa reru. Daga arra wa, shinko suru otoko-tachi to on'na-tachi ni wa, awaremi o kake rareru. Arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukai okata de ara reru
Ten ni ari-chi ni aru su subete no mono o shoyu nasa reru arra ni tatae are. Raise ni oite mo, tatae hakare no monodearu. Kare wa eimei ni shite subete ni tsujite ora reru
Kare wa daichi ni hairu mono, mata sore kara deru mono o subete shitte ora re, mata ten kara kudaru mono, narabini soko ni noboru mono subete o shitte ora reru. Kare wa jihibukaku kan'yode ara reru

Shinko no nai mono wa,`(shinpan no)-ji wa, watashi-tachi ni wa konaidearou.' To iu. Itte yaru ga i. `Iya, omo ni chikatte, sore wa kanarazu anata gata ni yattekuru nodearu. Yugen-kai made mo shitte ora reru omo ni chikatte. Ten ni oite mo ji ni oite mo, mijin no omo-sa demo, kare kara manukare rareru mono wanai. Mata sore yori chisai mono mo oki mono mo, meikakuna sho ni shirusa renai mono wanai
Sore wa kare ga, shinko shite zenko o suru mono ni, mukuwa reru tamedearu. Korera no mono ni koso, kan'yo to kandaina onmegumi ga arou
Daga ware no shirushi o munashiku suru tame ni doryoku suru mono, korera no mono ni wa itamashi chobatsu ga arou
Chishiki o sazukatta mononara,-nushi ga anata ni kudasa reta mono wa shinrideatte, sore ga iryoku aru kata, sanbi subeki ho no michi ni michibiku monodearu koto ga wakarudearou
Fushin-sha-tachi wa (chosho shite) iu. `Anata gataga konagona ni sa re chirasa reta nochi de, atarashiku sozo sa reru nado to tsugeru ningen o, oshiemashou ka
Daga kare wa arra ni tsuite, kyogi o itta no ka. Soretomo kichigai ni natte shimatta to iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa raise o shinjinai, chobatsu no naka ni iru hidoi kokoroechigai no monodearu

Kare-ra wa kare-ra no zengo ni aru ten to ji o minai no ka. Moshi hossurunaraba, ware ga kare-ra o daichi ni noma se, matawa ten'noikkaku o kare-ra no ue ni otosudearou. Hontoni sono nakaniha kaigo shite omoni kaeru shimo be ni totte no shirushi ga aru
